channel.title: Comments on: When can we neglect air resistance?
channel.description: iteration, making, building, and coding in education

item.title: By: goldenoj
item.dc:creator: goldenoj
item.description: One of my favorite questions. I was modeling field goals with a placekicker preservice teacher and we had to really work to get a realistic simulation. Tough to model without solving the differential equations, too.
item.content:encoded: One of my favorite questions. I was modeling field goals with a placekicker preservice teacher and we had to really work to get a realistic simulation. Tough to model without solving the differential equations, too.
